org.apache.nutch.parse

Class ParseImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.parse.ParseImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, Parse

    public class ParseImpl
extends Object
implements Parse, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    The result of parsing a page's raw content.
    See Also:
    Parser.getParse(Content)
